CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: blackpowder
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: An early metallic cartridge, filled with blackpowder and a simple lead projectile, leading to lower velocity and less accuracy. These are incompatible by design with autoloaders as they increase fouling immensely.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: blackpowder buckshot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A brass shotgun shell, filled with blackpowder and lead shot, leading to lower velocity and less accuracy. These are incompatible by design with autoloaders as they increase fouling immensely.
